parameters.name: name
parameters.doc: The name of the module to be managed

parameters.name: lib
parameters.doc: The name of the .so library to be loaded

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.doc: Module identifier string used by LoadModule. Default: module-name_module

providers.name: redhat
providers.doc: Manage Apache 2 modules on RedHat family OSs

providers.name: modfix
providers.doc:
Dummy provider for A2mod.

    Fake nil resources when there is no crontab binary available. Allows
    puppetd to run on a bootstrapped machine before a Cron package has been
    installed. Workaround for: http://projects.puppetlabs.com/issues/2384

providers.name: a2mod
providers.doc: Manage Apache 2 modules on Debian and Ubuntu
